lead_paragraph: One of Libya’s Parliaments appointed Gen. Khalifa Hifter on Monday be the commander in chief of the army in its war against Islamists, possibly damaging negotiations to stop the war in the North African nation.

headline.main: Libyan General’s Promotion Could Hinder United Nations Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Libyan General’s Promotion Could Hinder United Nations Peace Talks

snippet: One of Libya’s Parliaments appointed Gen. Khalifa Hifter on Monday be the commander in chief of the army in its war against Islamists, possibly damaging negotiations to stop the war in the North African nation.
